sentences: Lähedased sõbrad on alati meie jaoks olulised.
Need kaks inimest on väga lähedased teineteisega.
context: The word 'lähedased' is the plural form of the Estonian adjective 'lähine', which means close or nearby. When used as a noun, it refers to close people - relatives, friends, or dear ones who are emotionally close. The word conveys both physical proximity and emotional closeness.
